titleStmt.title: The Bishop of Gallovvay his dikaiologie contayning a iust defence of his former apologie. Against the iniust imputations of Mr. Dauid Hume.
titleStmt.author: Cowper, William, 1568-1619.
Hume, David, 1560?-1630?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham for Iohn Budge, and are to be sould at the great south-dore of Paules, and at Brittaines-Bursse,

notesStmt.note: The Bishop of Galloway = William Cowper.
A partial printing of and reply to an admonitory letter sent by David Hume.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Often bound with: The Bishop of Galloway his apologie.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
